title: Fulcrum releases updated Racing 4, 5 and 6 DB wheels
content:
Will Strickson
Wednesday, June 2, 2021 - 13:24

Campagnolo's wheel brand unveils update to entry-level aluminium wheels, prioritising reliability and versatility

From £339.99

Fulcrum has released updated versions of its Racing 4, 5 and 6 DB wheels, promising greater reliability and versatility in different conditions, gradients and distances.

Initially launched in 2018, the entry-level aluminium disc brake wheels from Campagnolo's wheel brand are designed to bring high performance wheels to the masses.

This update aims to modernise the builds, with the new wheels all tubeless ready and boasting wider rims and faster freehub engagement.

The brand says it aims to 'provide wheels that ensure reliable performance in different conditions, whether it's finding the right training setup, riding long distances or choosing a second set of wheels to fit your gravel bike'.

Halfcrum

Beginning with the Racing 4 DB wheels, which Fulcrum says have been adopted by Cofidis for their training bikes. The inner rim width has been increased from 17mm to 19mm to fit 25mm tyres, with a rim profile that has been lightened and CNC machined to allow for that change in shape.

These changes, Fulcrum says, mean the Racing 4 DB wheels are great for climbing while they don't lose stability on fast descents.

Image 2 of 36

Image 2 of 36

 

The endurance-primed Racing 5 DBs and versatile Racing 6 DBs have gone through a similar update, going one step further to take on 20mm inner rim widths meaning 28mm tyres will fit comfortably.

There are also lower profiles all round as the 5's new lower 24mm U-shaped profile, while decreasing aerodynamics and stiffness, helps to improve comfort and save energy, it's also the lightest of the bunch – Fulcrum says it weighs in at 1,660g.

Meanwhile the 6 also drops from 26mm to 24mm, but as the range's true entry-level model weighs the most, coming in at a claimed 1,780g.

All three models have Fulcrum's 2-Way Fit technology allowing for tubeless or clincher tyres to be fitted and the 4 and 5 have laser-etched graphics that ensure longlasting aesthetics.
